thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 107 of 7354
thread.title: Lawrence

author: Lawrence
title: Lawrence
text: Great experience every time I have ordered an item. Only discovered this site by an accident. Embarrassing but lucky. I clicked on their website in my favorites column by mistake, instead of Crutchfield, and was done ordering the Blu-ray player before I realized I had made the mistake. Certainly am glad because I've ordered several other item since and am pleased that I have had a good experience each time.
